4.2.1.1 Figuring Out an Approach to Data Labeling 
 
We were faced with the challenge of labeling about 200,000 samples, 
which was a daunting task to complete manually within a month. As a 
result, we needed to find an application that would enable us to 
collaborate on the data labeling process from any location. 
 
After exploring several options, we found that the available applications 
were either too complex, designed for broader data labeling purposes 
such as image recognition and segmentation, or were commercially 
oriented with expensive licenses and long-term commitments. 
Consequently, we made the decision to create our own labeling 
application that would support collaboration, streamline data entry, and 
facilitate quick data review.
